channel.title: [Delta] headicon
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
Server base: Delta Revision: 317 Type of problem: Headicon not working. Description: In tutorial Island when you just start playing runescape there's the Runescape guide and he has a flashing arrow above his head. I want this to. But the problem is when i add the yellow arrow to the npc it won't appear nor if i spawn it at a place on the ground. In the second case there's just a cow and it crash my client. Pictures: I don't think a picture is needed. If it is please ask.
Thank you for reading, halflive9
